content: mm any this size is too big for worsted weight yarn but will work with bulky weight yarn 6 0 mm any this size will work for heavier yarns like bernat blanket and can be made with any style tentacle you don t need to follow the norm on the eyes this pattern is for personal use only reproductions and or distributions of this pattern and all of its contents are not permitted limited quantities of finished products may be sold when selling or sharing products please give credit to the creator drpepperholik
